idea:

idea:
RebelCorp is building India’s first Platform for SMEs, StartUps & Individuals to easily create and manage their online presence. 

We have just launched our all-in-one web builder from where you can get your website live in the easiest possible way with no coding experience whatsoever.


Using our web builder technology we are enabling millions of people to get their websites & e-commerce stores online with pricing starting at 799 per month.


A platform that empowers you to access & transact with your customers directly and not depend on any of the tech guys to manage your websites on any device Desktop, Tablet or Mobile. It is so simple, you can even build a website yourself and don’t even need to know any coding.


You can also visit our website and start a trial of our software for free by accessing www.RebelCorp.in
name: RebelCorp
